subject: Breeders' Cup World Thoroughbred Championships
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: George Washington, considered one of the top horses in Europe, sustained a fractured right front leg during the running of the Breeders’ Cup Classic on Saturday and had to be euthanized.
snippet: George Washington, considered one of the top horses in Europe, sustained a fractured right front leg during the running of the Breeders’ Cup Classic on Saturday and had to be euthanized.
